cards.title: Software Development
cards.description: Familiar with common software development process and tools. Experienced in full stack development.

cards.title: System Management
cards.description: Experienced in managing IT infrastructure through the use scripting and management tools.

cards.title: Competitive Programing
cards.description: Actively participated in global coding competitions such as Google Kick Start and Leetcode Contests.

cards.title: SDE Intern
cards.description: Designed a new template translation framework for the Alexa Presentation Language.
detail: Developed a plugin for Sketch using JavaScript to export sketch design to Alexa Presentation Language
Utilized AWS S3 and Cloud-Front to upload and generate image URL to simplify user workflow.
Communicated with the stakeholder and PM to update requirements and provide relevant updates.
Integrated the framework within the authoring tool website, increasing feature accessibility.

cards.title: Software Engineer Intern
cards.description: Developed production software used to validate networking software and hardwares.
detail: Developed Windows applications in C# to validate networking hardware to reduce manual testing
Utilized MD5 hashing algorithm in the application to generate security hash to enhance hardware compatibility and security.
Performed code reviews & system verification on a production software to ensure system quality.

cards.title: Hardware Team Member
cards.description: Volunteered at a school club to provide IT services for faculty of Science student and build web applications.
detail: Utilized Fog and MDT to manage system image and group policies on the school computers.
Contributed to the development of a printing service website and laptop lending system.

cards.title: Laptop Lending System
cards.description: Developed a full stack application using Django and React for form management and status tracking.

cards.title: Sudoku Solver Web
cards.description: A Typescript Sudoku solver capable of solving and generating sudoku.

cards.title: Web Multplayer Maze
cards.description: Real time web game that tracks player movement using the firestore, real time database.

cards.title: Academic Excellence
cards.description: Passionately engaged in academic courses and maintained a GPA of 3.98/4.

cards.title: Extra Curricular Activities
cards.description: Actively participated in computer taskforce and school competitions to enhance university experience.

cards.title: Awards and Scholarship
cards.description: Received renewable scholarship and named on the Dean's Honour List 3 consecutive school year.
